title: user login with email and password
description: Test the /auth/login POST endpoint to verify user login functionality with valid and invalid email and password combinations, including validation of minimum password length and proper error handling.

title: user registration with email confirmation
description: Test the /auth/register POST endpoint to ensure new users can register with valid name, email, and password, including email format validation, minimum length checks, and triggering of email confirmation process.

title: google oauth authentication
description: Test the /auth/google GET endpoint to verify the Google OAuth authentication flow initiates correctly and handles success and failure scenarios appropriately.

title: get all campaigns for workspace
description: Test the /campaigns GET endpoint with a valid workspace_id query parameter to retrieve all campaigns associated with the workspace, verifying response structure and data correctness.

title: create new campaign
description: Test the /campaigns POST endpoint to create a new campaign with valid data including name, description, budget, status, start_date, and end_date, ensuring proper validation and successful creation.

title: update campaign
description: Test the /campaigns/{id} PUT endpoint to update an existing campaign by id with valid updated fields, verifying that changes are persisted and invalid updates are handled gracefully.

title: delete campaign
description: Test the /campaigns/{id} DELETE endpoint to delete a campaign by id, ensuring the campaign is removed and appropriate responses are returned for non-existent or unauthorized deletions.

title: get all brand voices for workspace
description: Test the /brand-voices GET endpoint to retrieve all brand voices for the workspace, verifying response data and access control.

title: create new brand voice
description: Test the /brand-voices POST endpoint to create a new brand voice with valid name, description, tone, personality array, and guidelines, ensuring data validation and successful creation.

title: get all personas for workspace
description: Test the /personas GET endpoint to retrieve all personas for the workspace, verifying response correctness and access permissions.
